name: intersociety
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between different organizations for people who share similar interests: The Horticultural Society and the Botany Association are planning to hold an inter-society vegetable-growing competition. I spent hours preparing for the intersociety debating contest.
between different human societies: We should be aiming to restore inter-society equality. Looking at Europe and the Middle East, there are notable intersociety differences in the employment of women. Related word
society
More examplesFewer examplesShe was chosen to represent the literary society in the annual intersociety debate.They started to plan for an intersociety convention.The state is ideologically opposed to any kind of inter- society conflict.
